languages.text: "Ты предала меня, сестра Арджента? Твоя вера слаба и убога, изменница!"
"You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"
languages.original_text: "Ты предала меня, сестра Арджента? Твоя вера слаба и убога, изменница!"

traits.locale_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"
"You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"
"You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"
"You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"
"You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

languages.text: “你居然背叛我，阿洁塔修女？你这叛徒！你的信仰太软弱，太可悲了！”
languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

traits.locale_text: “你居然背叛我，阿洁塔修女？你这叛徒！你的信仰太软弱，太可悲了！”

languages.text: 「私を裏切るのか、シスター・アルジェンタ？兄弟姉妹を裏切るのか！なんと弱く、哀れな信仰心だ！」
languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

traits.locale_text: 「私を裏切るのか、シスター・アルジェンタ？兄弟姉妹を裏切るのか！なんと弱く、哀れな信仰心だ！」

languages.text: «¿Me has traicionado, hermana Argenta? ¡Desertora! ¡Tu fe es débil y patética!».
languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Me has traicionado, hermana Argenta? ¡Desertora! ¡Tu fe es débil y patética!».

languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

languages.text: « Vous me trahissez, sœur Argenta ? Félonne ! Votre foi est pitoyablement faible ! »
languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous me trahissez, sœur Argenta ? Félonne ! Votre foi est pitoyablement faible ! »

languages.text: "Ihr habt mich verraten, Schwester Argenta? Überläuferin! Euer Glaube ist schwach und jämmerlich!"
languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mich verraten, Schwester Argenta? Überläuferin! Euer Glaube ist schwach und jämmerlich!"

languages.text: "Bana ihanet mi ediyorsun Rahibe Argenta? Dönek! Senin inancın zayıf ve acınasıymış!"
languages.original_text: "You have betrayed me, Sister Argenta? Defector! Your faith is weak and pitiful!"

traits.locale_text: "Bana ihanet mi ediyorsun Rahibe Argenta? Dönek! Senin inancın zayıf ve acınasıymış!"
